mapper.select: select articleId, originalAuthor, articleTags, articleTitle, articleType, publishDate, articleCategories, articleTabloid, likes from article
select articleTitle, articleTabloid from article where articleId = #{articleId}
select count(*) from article where articleCategories = #{category}
select count(*) from article where publishDate like concat('%', #{archive}, '%')
select articleId, originalAuthor, articleTitle, articleTags, articleType, articleCategories, publishDate from article order by id desc
select articleId, originalAuthor, articleTitle, articleTags, articleType, articleCategories, publishDate from article where publishDate like concat('%', #{archive}, '%') order by id desc
select articleId, originalAuthor, articleTitle, articleTags, articleType, articleCategories, publishDate from article where articleTags like concat('%', #{tag}, '%') order by id desc
select articleId, articleTitle from article where articleId = #{articleId}
